name: Candy Catch (Josue's Games)
description:
Candy Catch is a fun trick or treating type game. Candy falls from the sky and you need to catch it by moving around side to side with the arrow keys or WASD. But be careful for surprises, or else you could get attacked by a spider, bat, or bone.

Credits: Main Menu & Neighborhood Background images made by Freepik. Background music made by Epic Journey - Royalty Free Zone & xBeat No Copyright Music.

For best gameplay, go into fullscreen. Some of the game is cut of without fullscreen.
